item.title: AI power demand is forcing a coal revival. Jefferies sees more than 30% rally in one such stock
item.description: Long viewed as part of the "old economy," coal is now exacting revenge by taking market share from fuels like natural gas that displaced it.

item.title: BMO says buy this little-known energy stock that's cheap, can jump more than 25%
item.description: BMO Capital Markets foresees shares of Weatherford International rising 27% from here.

item.title: Here are Friday's biggest analyst calls: Nvidia, Tesla, SharkNinja, Ferrari, Synchrony, Advanced Micro Devices, Caterpillar, Oracle & more
item.description: Here are Friday's biggest calls on Wall Street.

item.title: Citi says to buy the dip in Oracle, sees stock soaring nearly 40% from here
item.description: Oracle's upcoming AI World event, which takes place in Oct. 13 and Oct. 16, could serve as a catalyst for the stock.

item.title: Here are Goldman's top trades for earnings season
item.description: Stocks that could rise on the back of their next quarterly earnings include Hershey and Wynn Resorts.
